$$Logit(p_f(z, \theta)) = \beta_{0, p_f, i} + \beta_{z, p_f} * z + \\
f_s(\theta_{t, mean, i}) + f_s(\theta_{p, total, i}) + \\
  \beta_{p_f, \theta_t, seas} * \theta_{t, seas, i} + \\
\beta_{p_f, \theta_p, seaS} * \theta_{p, seas, i} + \\
\beta_{p_f, \theta_{s2}, mean} * \theta_{s2, mean, i} +
  \beta_{p_f, \theta_{s2}, seas} * \theta_{s2, seas, i} + \\
\beta_{p_f, \theta_t \times z, seas} * \theta_{t, seas, i} * z +
  \beta_{p_f, \theta_p \times z, seas} * \theta_{p, seas, i} * z + \\
\beta_{p_f, \theta_{s2} \times z, mean} * \theta_{s2, mean, i} * z +
  \beta_{p_f, \theta_{s2} \times z, seas} * \theta_{s2, seas, i} * Z . \tag{4.1.8}$$
